title: France
description: Known for its rich culture, iconic Eiffel Tower, exquisite cuisine, and world-class art museums like the Louvre. A hub of romance and history.

title: Japan
description: A land of technology, ancient traditions, cherry blossoms, samurai heritage, and sushi. Famous for Mount Fuji and bustling Tokyo.

title: Malaysia
description: A multicultural nation with stunning beaches, tropical rainforests, and vibrant cities like Kuala Lumpur. Home to the iconic Petronas Towers.

title: New York
description: Known as The Big Apple, it is a global hub for finance, culture, and entertainment. Famous for landmarks Empire State Building.

title: South Korea
description: Renowned for K-pop, advanced technology, and historical palaces. A blend of tradition and modernity with scenic landscapes.

title: Dubai
description: A futuristic city with towering skyscrapers, luxury shopping, desert safaris, and the iconic Burj Khalifa.

title: Sweden
description: Famous for its innovation, picturesque landscapes, northern lights, and design excellence. A leader in sustainability.

title: Bangkok
description: Thailandâ€™s capital, famed for ornate temples, bustling markets, and vibrant nightlife. A cultural and modern blend.

title: Thailand
description: Known for its tropical islands, Buddhist temples, and vibrant street food. A popular tourist destination.
